trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the name of the associated property is displayed with parentheses in the Properties window.

A <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute> with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A> value of `true` indicates to the Properties window that the associated property should be displayed with parentheses around its name.

The Properties window displays a property with parentheses around its name near the top of the list in alphabetical mode, or near the top of its category if the Properties window is in categorize mode.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class, using the specified value to indicate whether the attribute is displayed with parentheses.
`true` if the name should be enclosed in parentheses; otherwise, `false`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class with a default value that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
Compares the specified object to this object and tests for equality.
Gets the hash code for this object.
The hash code for the object the attribute belongs to.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
`true` if the current value of the attribute is the default value of the attribute; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the Properties window displays the name of the property in parentheses in the Properties window.
`true` if the property is displayed with parentheses; otherwise, `false`.
